doc:
Wood Harris https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wood_Harris 0 Sherwin David "Wood" Harris (born October 17, 1969) is an American actor. He has portrayed the drug kingpin Avon Barksdale on the HBO crime drama The Wire, cocaine dealer Ace in Paid in Full and high school football player Julius Campbell in the 2000 film Remember the Titans. He is also known for playing Brooke Payne on the BET miniseries The New Edition Story in 2017. As of 2016, he plays Barry Fouray on VH1 miniseries The Breaks. Sherwin_David_"_Wood_"_Harris ( born October_17_,_1969 ) is an_American_actor . He has_portrayed the_drug_kingpin_Avon_Barksdale on the_HBO_crime_drama The_Wire , cocaine_dealer_Ace in Paid in Full_and_high_school_football_player_Julius_Campbell in the_2000_film Remember the_Titans . He is_also_known for playing Brooke_Payne on the_BET_miniseries The_New_Edition_Story in 2017 . As of 2016 , he plays Barry_Fouray on VH1_miniseries The_Breaks .
